title: [K-12] Design-Based Research on Instructional Design for Understanding Linear Algebra Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations and fundamental algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: Targeting pre-researchers requiring foundational linear algebra concepts for social system analysis in engineering. Blended learning integrating online/offline activities in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain linear combinations, generating sets, and generating spaces with over 80% accuracy through mathematical definitions and examples.
Learners can generate three or more case studies applying concepts using visualization tools for spanning sets in 2D/3D vector spaces
Through team-based project execution, learners can produce analytical reports applying linear algebra concepts to real-world engineering problems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
